turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a Venti iced caramel latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Rock Road in Wichita, Kansas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. And what milk did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. so you want a venti iced caramel latte with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did I get that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is your total. Did you want me to place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add three extra pumps of caramel, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, let me edit your order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Venti iced caramel latte with almond milk and 3 extra pumps of caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, the total will remain the same.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks on rock road in kansas. It should be ready for pick up in about 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
